code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import"./StartupProjects.scss";import{bigProjects}from"../../portfolio";import{Fade}from"react-reveal";import StyleContext from"../../contexts/StyleContext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function StartupProject(){function openUrlInNewTab(url){if(!url){return;}var win=window.open(url,"_blank");win.focus();}const{isDark}=useContext(StyleContext);if(!bigProjects.display){return null;}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fade,{bottom:true,duration:1000,distance:"20px",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main",id:"projects",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"skills-heading",children:bigProjects.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:isDark?"dark-mode project-subtitle":"subTitle project-subtitle",children:bigProjects.subtitle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"projects-container",children:bigProjects.projects.map((project,i)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:isDark?"dark-mode project-card project-card-dark":"project-card project-card-light",children:[project.image?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project-image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:project.image,alt:project.projectName,className:"card-image"})}):null,/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-detail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:isDark?"dark-mode card-title":"card-title",children:project.projectName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:isDark?"dark-mode card-subtitle":"card-subtitle",children:project.projectDesc}),project.footerLink?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project-card-footer",children:project.footerLink.map((link,i)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:isDark?"dark-mode project-tag":"project-tag",onClick:()=>openUrlInNewTab(link.url),children:link.name},i);})}):null]})]},i);})})]})})});}
